subject: Fw: [Fwd: How to detect an existense of some text in web-page?]
msgSnippet: Hi! I am still trying to write simple htmlunit test cases... and I have some questions here... How can I detect some text in web page. Here I have Web Camera
messageBody:
Hi!
I am still trying to write simple htmlunit test cases... and I have some
questions here...

How can I detect some text in web page. Here I have "Web Camera" text
and I need somehow check if it is on page or it is not

<div class="portlet-wrap-title">


<span class="portlet-title"
id="portlet-title-bar_92_INSTANCE_soeL">
Web Camera
</span>


</div>
How could I come to span or to reach that text or how could I go through
all the html and find that "Web Camera" text.

Another question would be... we have <style type="text/css"> and some
text that describes style of the page. How could we check what
font-family we have there. Is it possible?

Thanks a lot
Diana
